alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette and southwestern Haywood Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Arlington, or 16 miles northeast of Cordova, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Mason, Gallaway, Stanton, Braden, Yum Yum, Belmont, Cotton Lake, Canaan Grove, Longtown, Moorman, Taylor Chapel, Keeling, Lambert, Gainesville, Griffen, Meux Corner and Hickory Withe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
